sentence.Network_en: They are almost as expeditious and effectual as Aladdin's lamp.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们几乎像如意神灯那么迅速有效.

sentence.Network_en: Quinine is an effectual preventive for malaria.
sentence.Network_cn: 奎宁是有效的疟疾预防药.

sentence.Network_en: This is the only effectual way to secure our present and future happiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是确保我们现在及以后都会幸福的唯一有效途径。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... efface 消除,冲淡 effectual 有效的 effectuate 使实现,实践.
英语：形容人的形容词_百度知道 ... earthy 泥土似的 effectual 奏效的 exceptional 非凡的.
effecttransistor 效应传感器, effectual 显效, effectual-time 见效时间
confect... ... imperfect a. 有缺点的,半完成的,减弱的, effectual a. 有效果的,会应验的,有效的 infection n. 传染,影响,传染病.

list.abs: ...人不是这样想的，此论文将这另一批人的想法，称之为「效果型思维」(Effectual Reasoning)，典型的发散型思维，他们不求哪里有 …
... ) effective operation 有效运行 ) effectual remedy 行之有效的疗法 ) feasible learning methods 行之有效的学习方法.
effectively 有效地事实上实际上effectiveness effectual 奏效的灵验的effectually
沪江词库精选effectual demand是什么意思、英语短语。effectual demand的中文翻译: 有效需求相关短语:  effectual drug 显效药  effectual demand 有效需求到沪江.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin effectualis, from Latin effectus (see effect)

entry.def: If an action or plan is effectual, it succeeds in producing the results that were intended.

example.ex: This is the only effectual way to secure our present and future happiness.
example.tran: 这是确保我们现在及以后都会幸福的唯一有效途径。

sentences.sentence: "a man to whom painting was but another and less effectual way of writing dramas or novels or history"

means.word_mean: 2. producing or capable of producing an intended result or having a striking effect;

sentences.sentence: "an air-cooled motor was more effective than a witch's broomstick for rapid long-distance transportation"-LewisMumford
"his complaint proved to be effectual in bringing action"

means.word_mean: 3. exerting or capable of exerting strong physiological or chemical effects;

auth_sentence.content: The perjury of the witnesses placed an effectual barrier against conviction.
auth_sentence.res_content: The perjury of the witnesses placed an effectual barrier against conviction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The perjury of the witnesses placed an effectual barrier against conviction.

auth_sentence.content: The most effectual Care...to insure us of God's performing his Part.
auth_sentence.res_content: The most effectual Care...to insure us of God's performing his Part.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The most effectual Care...to insure us of God's performing his Part.

auth_sentence.content: You shall not again tempt me to anticipate the question of effectual Grace.
auth_sentence.res_content: You shall not again tempt me to anticipate the question of effectual Grace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You shall not again tempt me to anticipate the question of effectual Grace.
